abstract: Ajay Banga, a senior Citigroup banking executive and the head of the beleaguered firm’s Asia-Pacific business, is leaving to become MasterCard’s president and chief operating officer.
snippet: Ajay Banga, a senior Citigroup banking executive and the head of the beleaguered firm’s Asia-Pacific business, is leaving to become MasterCard’s president and chief operating officer.
lead_paragraph: Ajay Banga, a senior Citigroup banking executive and the head of the beleaguered firm’s Asia-Pacific business, is leaving to become MasterCard‘s president and chief operating officer.

headline.main: Citigroup’s Banga to Join MasterCard as President
